subject: Re: great clear 12-470 file give a listen
author: LC Duplatt
full_text:
Bruce, all your stuff is great. ;)

I know you clean the recording up and slow it down a bit.  When you 
are talking on the tape is it at regular speed and is it cleaned up 
also?

I have more set-up experiments to run starting next week.  Looking 
for the best clarity and mic combinations. 

LC

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "bhali333" 
<paranormalinvestigating@...> wrote:
>
> hey people,
> 
> I usually don't post just one file but this one I think is great.
> And it shows what that little RS-470 dynamo can do.

> Bruce
